report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-1417 GitLab Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-1417 GitLab Vulnerability
text: GitLab could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper access control. By sending a specially-crafted request using CI jobs, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access contents of Project Members-only Wikis, and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.
